For any BB users- I downloaded this and installed it and all went fine there. The game also launches fine and whatnot, but my previous safe files were gone. I also tried the update with the old black box crack files, but it just took me to the Uplay screen when I tried to launch where you have to put a CD key in. I don't know what I really expected, but it was worth a shot to see if it fixed the save problem I was having before, i.e. when you try to save in the game the save icon flashes infinitely until you quit and no save is recorded. Uplay is behind all of this, I guess.

Certain release groups make the games save differently (to circumvent uPlay).
THETA and Black Box are a couple that do that.

I have the "Could not retrieve version number! Installation will be aborted." too.. No one found a solution about it? :)

The best solution is to wait for your respective release group to come out with their own update.
That is if they are even going to bother making one.

That's why it's better to wait for proper scene release instead of grabbing the very first thing that comes out.

It would also be good practice to wait on playing the game until the actual release date, because there will always be updates/patches.

The fix for the error "Could not Retrieve Version Number! Installation will now aborted":
--------
1- Go to regedit
2- Find the folder: HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESOFTWAREUbisoftFarcry 3, and make sure the path in InstallDir and the Version number are correct.
2.1- Then go to HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESoftwareWow6432NodeMicrosoftWindowsCurrentVersionUninstall
2.2- Create a new key in this folder named {E3B9C5A9-BD7A-4B56-B754-FAEA7DD6FA88} exactly like this. Then in the new key you just created, make a new string named DisplayVersion, and set it value to the version of the game you have(1.00 or 1.01). Then launch the update file (1.01 or 1.02) and it should work.
--------

the fix for the error: "Could not Retrieve Version Number! Installation will now aborted".
--------
1- Go to regedit
2- Find the folder: HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESOFTWAREUbisoftFarcry 3, and make sure the path in InstallDir and the Version number are correct.
2.1- Then go to HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESoftwareWow6432NodeMicrosoftWindowsCurrentVersionUninstall
2.2- Create a new key in this folder named {E3B9C5A9-BD7A-4B56-B754-FAEA7DD6FA88} exactly like this. Then in the new key you just created, make a new string named DisplayVersion, and set it value to the version of the game you have(1.00 or 1.01). Then launch the update file (1.01 or 1.02) and it should work.
--------
